Package Core2D.Input.PC

Class Mouse

java.lang.Object
Core2D.Input.PC.Mouse
public class Mouse extends Object
Mouse class. If you want to track cursor buttons, then import GLFW and pass GLFW constants to the methods.

    • resetButtons

      public static void resetButtons()

    • handleMouseInput

      public static void handleMouseInput()
      Processes cursor input. Checks each button alternately whether it is clamped. Calculates the cursor position relative to the screen and relative to viewportSize and viewportPosition.

    • setMousePosition
